name: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: An open-world action-adventure game where players explore the kingdom of Hyrule, solve puzzles, and battle enemies to defeat Calamity Ganon.

name: Elden Ring
description: An action RPG developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco, featuring an open world co-created by George R.R. Martin.

name: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An open-world action-adventure game set in 1899, following the story of Arthur Morgan and the decline of the Wild West.

name: Cyberpunk 2077
description: A futuristic open-world RPG set in Night City, where players take on the role of V, a mercenary seeking immortality.

name: God of War (2018)
description: A reimagining of the God of War series, following Kratos and his son Atreus as they journey through Norse mythology.

name: Grand Theft Auto V
description: An open-world action-adventure game featuring three protagonists in Los Santos, with an expansive online multiplayer mode.

name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: An action RPG where players control Geralt of Rivia as he searches for his adopted daughter in a vast, open world.

name: Dark Souls III
description: The third entry in the challenging action RPG series by FromSoftware, featuring intricate level design and tough enemies.

name: Hollow Knight
description: A critically acclaimed 2D Metroidvania game featuring deep exploration, challenging combat, and beautiful hand-drawn art.

name: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: An action-adventure game by FromSoftware, featuring fast-paced sword combat and a gripping samurai-era story.
